description.@en: You conjure forth a murder of crows, which harry and harm your enemies.

data.distance: Any one place you can see

criticalFailure.@en: You call forth a flock of murderous crows – armed with iron beaks and dagger-like talons – not from the Material Realm but from the Abyss! They swoop about you and you suffer [[/roll 2D10]]+[WB] in Damage and begin to Bleed.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but those caught in the Feast for Crows begin to Bleed.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, you can conjure a flock of murderous crows that swoop about your enemies, dispersing only after tasting blood. All those who are caught within the Burst Template suffer [[/roll 2D10]]+[WB] in Damage.
